solution_line_template: Since Venice has {venice_more_than_jamestown} more theme parks than Jamestown, there are {jamestown_parks}+{venice_more_than_jamestown} = <<{jamestown_parks}+{venice_more_than_jamestown}={venice_parks}>>{venice_parks} theme parks in Venice.
Together, Venice and Jamestown have {venice_parks}+{jamestown_parks} = <<{venice_parks}+{jamestown_parks}={venice_jamestown_total}>>{venice_jamestown_total} theme parks

With {marina_del_ray_more_than_jamestown} more theme parks than Jamestown, Marina Del Ray has {marina_del_ray_more_than_jamestown}+{jamestown_parks} = <<{marina_del_ray_more_than_jamestown}+{jamestown_parks}={marina_del_ray_parks}>>{marina_del_ray_parks} theme parks.
The total number of theme parks in the three towns is {marina_del_ray_parks}+{venice_jamestown_total} = <<{marina_del_ray_parks}+{venice_jamestown_total}={total_parks}>>{total_parks}
